12: Read and Write limitations with folding have been clarified. These
13: limits allow the possibility of warriors essentially running in a
14: mini-core inside core, folding out-of-bounds access attempts back into
15: accessible memory. The main advantages to folding are: old-style
16: bombers like Dwarf do not unfairly and unknowingly spend cycles doing
17: nothing, and movement to seek and destroy enemy warriors is still
18: encouraged by the limits. The main disadvantage is that limits which
19: are not factors of the size of core lead to unexpected results.
20: Example: a reference to address location -1 is adjusted to M-1 when
